meanings.definition: Explore caves as a hobby or profession.
meanings.sent1: I love to spelunk in the deep caves near my home.
meanings.sent2: Many adventurers spelunk to discover hidden treasures underground.
meanings.sent3: Why did the geologist bring a ladder to spelunk? To reach new heights!
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity led her to spelunk into the unknown depths of the cave of mysteries.
meanings.sent5: The brave spelunker illuminated the dark cavern with his flashlight.

meanings.sent1: The spelunk showed us the intricate tunnels he had discovered.
meanings.sent2: We met a friendly spelunker who shared stories of his cave explorations.
meanings.sent3: The spelunk's helmet had a sticker that read, 'Cave Explorer Extraordinaire.'
meanings.sent4: In the world of adventurers, the spelunk is a fearless explorer of the underground.
meanings.sent5: The experienced spelunker guided the group through the narrow passageways.

meanings.sent1: Spelunk is an exciting activity for those who love to discover hidden wonders.
meanings.sent2: The spelunk of the vast underground network was both thrilling and challenging.
meanings.sent3: During the spelunk, they found a bat hanging upside down in a small crevice.
meanings.sent4: The spelunk revealed a breathtaking underground world filled with stalactites and stalagmites.
meanings.sent5: The group embarked on a spelunk to unravel the mysteries of the ancient cave system.
